name: Modern Sofa
description: A sleek, gray fabric sofa with a modern silhouette, perfect for contemporary living spaces.

name: Wooden Dining Table
description: A durable oak wood dining table with a natural finish, ideal for family meals and gatherings.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: A black ergonomic office chair featuring breathable mesh and lumbar support for all-day comfort.

name: Queen Bed Frame
description: A sturdy metal queen bed frame in matte black, offering a minimalist look and strong support.

name: Bookshelf with Drawers
description: A stylish walnut bookshelf with multiple shelves and drawers for versatile storage and display.

name: Accent Armchair
description: A luxurious velvet armchair in emerald green, adding a bold and elegant touch to any room.

name: Coffee Table
description: A contemporary glass coffee table with chrome accents, perfect for modern living rooms.

name: Nightstand
description: A compact white nightstand made of solid pine, ideal for bedside essentials and decor.

name: TV Stand
description: An espresso-colored MDF TV stand offering ample space for media devices and storage.

name: Bar Stool Set (2)
description: A set of two tan leatherette bar stools with a modern design, great for kitchen islands or bars.
